## Set things up

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

## Importing data

```{r}
tomatoes <- read.csv(here("Data", "tomato_data.csv"))
```

## Changing data

```{r}
tomatoes |> slice(c(3, 7, 9))

tomatoes |> filter(Avg_tomato_weight_g >= 145)
```
